## Dubrink is your trusted partner across the entire CBAM supply chain.‌‌‍‍‌‌‌‌‌‌‌‌‌‍‌‍‌‌

Dubrink works with importers, suppliers & distributors, customs representatives and consultants & verifiers to manage CBAM compliance efficiently, streamlining processes and reducing risks throughout the compliance journey.

## Leverage Dubrink's CBAM ecosystem

Join Dubrink's ecosystem and benefit from our end-to-end CBAM compliance solutions.

Report, calculate, communicate, and forecast—all in one place. Fully automated, with access to audit and verification, ensuring compliance in just a few clicks.

> Dubrink's comprehensive approach to CBAM is great. They provide essential guidance through every step of the process, from initial calculations to generating the final XML file. As a consultant, I primarily use the platform for calculation and XML file preparation, and I'm particularly impressed by its consistent updates to the latest EU requirements. These regular updates ensure that my declarations are both quick and accurate.

### Raccogli, calcola, valida e riporta i dati sulle emissioni dei fornitori in un’unica operazione!

Il software conforme al CBAM di Dubrink è la piattaforma per importatori, fornitori e consulenti, che garantisce CBAM completi e corretti. Riduci al minimo il rischio di sanzioni. Prenota una demo oggi stesso!

[Prenota una demo](https://calendly.com/marcelduits/dubrink-demonstration)

## Perché la piattaforma CBAM di Dubrink è diversa?

Secondo il CBAM, gli importatori devono ottenere dati accurati sulla configurazione della fabbrica e calcolarli secondo il metodo richiesto dall’UE.

La piattaforma intelligente CBAM di Dubrink gestisce richiesta, calcolo, validazione, mappatura, presentazione e archiviazione dei dati sulle emissioni, garantendo prove pronte per futuri audit.

Unica nel suo genere, la piattaforma di Dubrink guida importatori e fornitori attraverso il processo CBAM in modo fluido e conforme alle normative UE.

[Ottieni la storia completa](https://www.dubrink.com/simplify-eu-cbam-documentation)

![CBAM specialst Software xml](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-specialst-Software-xml-1.jpg)

![cbam compliance help](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-platform-reporting.png)

## Salta il modello di comunicazione

Dubrink ha rivoluzionato il processo di compilazione dei dati CBAM. Sia i fornitori che gli importatori affermano che il software di Dubrink rende la compilazione dei dati CBAM incredibilmente semplice. Vediamo che i fornitori saranno felici di fornire le informazioni di cui gli importatori hanno bisogno. Inoltre, il software di Dubrink offre un vantaggio significativo per i fornitori. Caricando i loro dati una sola volta, possono condividerli facilmente con più importatori, risparmiando loro una quantità enorme di tempo ed energie. Una volta che le installazioni e i processi sono pronti, basta un clic per condividere!

## Interfaccia fluida e intuitiva

La piattaforma conforme al CBAM di Dubrink offre un’interfaccia intuitiva progettata per soddisfare sia gli importatori che i fornitori con la massima semplicità. Eliminando le complessità spesso associate ai fogli Excel forniti dalla Commissione Europea, la piattaforma riduce significativamente il tempo dedicato alle attività di conformità.

Abbiamo osservato un notevole aumento della cooperazione dei fornitori e della loro disponibilità a fornire dati, attribuibile alla natura intuitiva della piattaforma. Con il software di conforme al CBAM di Dubrink, importatori e fornitori trovano la navigazione dei requisiti di conformità un’esperienza senza intoppi.

![Indirect Emission Calculator](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Indirect-Emission-Calculator-2.png)

## Oltre i confini della fabbrica…

![Precursor Information CBAM](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Precursor-CBAM-Platform.png)

## … e mitigando i rischi

Attraverso un processo intuitivo di ricostruzione visiva delle installazioni, dei processi e delle emissioni della fabbrica, i fornitori offrono agli importatori una chiara mappatura visiva dei loro processi CBAM, inclusi i documenti di prova.

Mappare il processo è essenziale per garantire una corretta prova durante gli audit futuri.

### Sammeln, berechnen, validieren und berichten Sie Lieferantenemissionsdaten in nur einem Schritt!

Die CBAM-Compliance-Software von Dubrink ist die Plattform für Importeure, Lieferanten und Berater, die umfassende und korrekte CBAM-Daten gewährleistet. Minimieren Sie das Risiko von Strafen. Buchen Sie noch heute eine Demo!

[Planen Sie eine Demo](https://calendly.com/marcelduits/dubrink-demonstration)

## Warum ist die CBAM-Plattform von Dubrink anders?

Im Rahmen des [CBAM](https://taxation-customs.ec.europa.eu/carbon-border-adjustment-mechanism_en?prefLang=de) sind Importeure verpflichtet, genaue Daten zu erwerben, die die korrekte Fabrikeinrichtung (einschließlich Installationen und Prozesse) widerspiegeln, und Daten gemäß der von der EU gewünschten Berechnungsmethode zu berechnen.

Die intelligente CBAM-Plattform von Dubrink verwaltet die Anforderung, Berechnung, Validierung, Zuordnung, Einreichung und Speicherung von Emissionsdaten und stellt sicher, dass Nachweise bei Audits auch Jahre später problemlos vorgelegt werden können.

Die Plattform von Dubrink ist einzigartig und führt sowohl Importeure als auch Lieferanten nahtlos durch den CBAM-Prozess, der vollständig mit den EU-Vorschriften übereinstimmt.

[Mehr lesen](https://www.dubrink.com/simplify-eu-cbam-documentation)

![CBAM specialst Software xml](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-specialst-Software-xml-1.jpg)

![cbam compliance help](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-platform-reporting.png)

## Überspringen Sie die Kommunikationstemplates

Dubrink hat den Prozess der CBAM-Datenerfassung revolutioniert. Sowohl Lieferanten als auch Importeure sagen, dass die Software von Dubrink das Einreichen von CBAM-Daten unglaublich einfach macht. Wir sehen, dass Lieferanten gerne die Informationen bereitstellen, die Importeure benötigen.

Darüber hinaus bietet die Software von Dubrink Lieferanten einen erheblichen Vorteil. Indem sie ihre Daten einmal hochladen, können sie diese mühelos mit mehreren Importeuren teilen und sparen so enorm viel Zeit und Aufwand. Sobald die Installationen und Prozesse bereit sind, ist es nur noch eine Frage des Klickens und Teilens!

## Reibungslose und intuitive Benutzeroberfläche

Die Dubrink CBAM-Compliance-Plattform bietet eine benutzerfreundliche Oberfläche, die sowohl für Importeure als auch für Lieferanten mit größter Einfachheit gestaltet ist. Durch die Eliminierung der Komplexitäten, die oft mit den von der Europäischen Kommission bereitgestellten Excel-Tabellen verbunden sind, reduziert die Plattform die für Compliance-Aufgaben aufgewendete Zeit erheblich.

Wir haben eine bemerkenswerte Zunahme der Kooperation und Bereitschaft der Lieferanten zur Datenbereitstellung festgestellt, was auf die intuitive Natur der Plattform zurückzuführen ist. Mit der CBAM-Compliance-Software von Dubrink finden Importeure und Lieferanten die Navigation durch die Compliance-Anforderungen zu einer nahtlosen Erfahrung.

![Indirect Emission Calculator](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Indirect-Emission-Calculator-2.png)

## Über die Fabrikgrenzen hinausgehen

![Precursor Information CBAM](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Precursor-CBAM-Platform.png)

## … und Risiken mindern

Durch einen intuitiven Prozess der visuellen Rekonstruktion von Fabrikanlagen, -prozessen und -emissionen ermöglichen Lieferanten den Importeuren eine klare visuelle Darstellung ihrer CBAM-Prozesse, einschließlich der Nachweisdokumente.

Die Abbildung des Prozesses ist unerlässlich, um bei zukünftigen Audits ordnungsgemäße Nachweise sicherzustellen.

## CBAM Doctor Live
# CBAM Doctor - Live

Join our weekly CBAM Doctor Live session, where one of our specialists answers your questions in real time. No appointments, no waiting—just expert advice to help you navigate CBAM challenges quickly and effectively. Tune in, ask your questions, and get the guidance you need!

![The Dubrink CBAM Doctor allows you to get answers to CBAM questions from real experts for free](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/cbam-doctor.Ge62IMKl_Z2je1Ke.webp)

## What is the CBAM Doctor?

Navigating CBAM regulations can be challenging, and we know there are many questions. That’s why we’re offering CBAM Doc Live—a **free** online consultation session where one of our specialists answers your questions live.
Each session lasts one hour, during which we aim to help as many people as possible. To ensure a smooth experience, we have a limited number of spots available per session. That’s why we operate on a ticket system—secure your spot by booking through the button below.

## About Dubrink

Under CBAM, importers are obligated to acquire accurate data reflecting the correct factory setup (including installations and processes) and calculate data according to the calculation method desired by the EU.
[Dubrink’s Intelligent CBAM Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-platform) manages the request, calculation, validation, mapping, submission, and storage of emission data, ensuring that evidence can be readily provided during audits years later.
Dubrink’s platform is a unique platform that guides both importers and suppliers through the CBAM process in a seamless manner that is fully compliant with EU regulations.

## Leadership

![Marcel Duits](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/marcel.BaBi8yK6_13Cn25.webp)

### Marcel Duits – Chief CBAM Officer

Marcel Duits is a driven entrepreneur, investor, and strategic leader with a passion for innovation and growth. As Chief CBAM Officer at Dubrink, he is responsible for the company’s commercial and operational strategy, with a strong focus on sales, marketing, finance, and managing key relationships.

Marcel plays a crucial role in expanding the Dubrink network—from factories and suppliers to importers and financial institutions involved in hedging CBAM certificates. With two master’s degrees from Erasmus University Rotterdam and extensive experience in launching and scaling businesses, he excels at simplifying complex processes and developing impactful solutions.

With a Unilever background, Marcel has built his expertise in strategic management, commercial execution, and operational excellence within a global corporate environment. His mission is to help companies worldwide navigate CBAM regulations while creating new opportunities for collaboration and growth.

* * *

### Jan-Joost den Brinker – Chief Technology Officer

Jan-Joost den Brinker is responsible for all IT and Technical operations at Dubrink, overseeing the development of the platform, website, and enterprise modules. As CTO, he ensures that Dubrink’s technology remains cutting-edge, scalable, and secure, enabling seamless CBAM compliance for importers and suppliers.

Beyond platform development, Jan-Joost also leads the integration of legal and regulatory frameworks into Dubrink’s digital infrastructure, ensuring compliance automation and accuracy. He heads Dubrink’s internal development team and various subject matter experts to drive innovation and maintain operational excellence.

With a background in consultancy at Accenture and Cognizant, he brings deep expertise in digital transformation, system & software architecture, and machine learning. His strategic leadership ensures that Dubrink continues to innovate and provide a robust technological foundation for global complance challenges.

## Privacy Policy Overview
# Privacy Policy

Effective Date: March 23th, 2025

This Privacy Policy explains how Dubrink s.r.o. (“we”, “our”, “us”) collects, uses, and protects your personal data when you visit our marketing website, [www.dubrink.com](https://www.dubrink.com/).

Dubrink s.r.o. is the controller of your personal data. We are a company incorporated in the Czech Republic, and we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable privacy laws.

* * *

1. ## What Data We Collect


We may collect the following types of personal data when you interact with our website:

- **Contact details** (e.g., name, email address, company) when you fill in our contact forms
- **Email address** if you subscribe to our newsletter
- **Technical information** such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and browsing behavior (via analytics, with consent)

* * *

2. ## How and Why We Use Your Data


We use your data for the following purposes:

| Purpose | Legal Basis |
| --- | --- |
| Responding to contact requests | Legitimate interest |
| Sending newsletters | Consent |
| Analyzing site traffic | Consent (via cookies) |
| Website performance and security | Legitimate interest (Cloudflare) |

* * *

3. ## Cookies and Analytics


We use cookies and tracking technologies to improve our website. These include:

- **Google Analytics** (DPF-certified, U.S.)
- **Microsoft Clarity** (DPF-certified, U.S.)

These tools are only activated **after you give consent** via our cookie banner. You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings or clearing cookies.

We do **not** store cookie consent logs on our servers.

* * *

4. ## Newsletters


If you subscribe to our newsletter, your data will be stored and processed by **Ecomail**, a EU-based GDPR-compliant email marketing platform. You can unsubscribe at any time via the link in our emails.

* * *

5. ## Data Retention


We retain personal data only for as long as necessary:

- **Contact form submissions**: Up to **12 months** after the last interaction
- **Newsletter data**: Until unsubscribed or inactive for **24 months**
- **Analytics data**: As per Google/Microsoft retention defaults and your consent

* * *

6. ## International Data Transfers


Some of our service providers are located outside the European Economic Area (EEA). Specifically:

- **Google Analytics**
- **Microsoft Clarity**
- **Cloudflare (hosting)**

These providers are certified under the **EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework (DPF)**, ensuring adequate protection for your data.

* * *

7. ## Your Rights


Under GDPR, you have the right to:

- Access your personal data
- Correct or update your data
- Request deletion
- Withdraw your consent
- Object to certain processing
- Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

To exercise any of these rights, contact us at: [privacy@dubrink.com](mailto:privacy@dubrink.com)

* * *

8. ## Data of Minors


Our website is intended for a professional audience and is **not directed at individuals under the age of 16**. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

* * *

9. ## Contact Details


**Controller:**

Dubrink s.r.o.

Kaprova 42/14, Prague, 110 00, Czech Republic

Email: [privacy@dubrink.com](mailto:privacy@dubrink.com)

* * *

10. ## Changes to This Policy


We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

### Cookie Settings

Help us improve your experience by collecting anonymous usage data.

Your data is always in sync across teams and locations. Access, edit, and share CBAM insights securely—anytime, anywhere.

Automatically notify supply chain partners to provide or report emission data on time. No more delays, no more guesswork.

## Understanding CBAM
# What is CBAM?

The Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) represents a groundbreaking climate policy introduced by the European Union to combat carbon leakage and promote global climate action. This comprehensive guide explains everything businesses need to know about CBAM compliance, reporting requirements, and implementation timelines.

## Understanding CBAM

CBAM serves as the EU's innovative response to the challenge of carbon leakage – where companies move production to countries with less stringent climate policies. By requiring importers to purchase carbon certificates corresponding to the carbon price that would have been paid had the goods been produced under the EU's carbon pricing rules, CBAM ensures a level playing field while supporting global climate goals.

The mechanism extends the EU's existing carbon pricing policies to imports, ensuring that the ambitious climate action being taken by EU industries is not undermined by less climate-conscious production in non-EU countries.

* * *

## Who is impacted by CBAM?

### EU Importers

- Companies importing CBAM goods into the EU market
- Responsible for reporting emissions data and purchasing CBAM certificates
- Must establish systems for tracking and verifying embedded emissions

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-importers)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/ship.BNMGszuW_2rjQt4.webp)

### Suppliers & Distributors

- Companies exporting CBAM-covered goods to the EU
- Required to provide detailed emissions data for their products
- Must implement emissions monitoring and reporting systems

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-suppliers-and-distributors)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/steel.Cq8v53BQ_ZNwwm5.webp)

### Customs Representatives and Verification Bodies

- Support importers with CBAM compliance
- Verify emissions calculations and documentation
- Submit verified reports to EU authorities

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-customs-representatives)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/customs.B39uiHCV_ZHItxq.webp)

* * *

## CBAM Timeline & Requirements

### Transitional Period (2023-2025)

During this phase, businesses must:

- Report quarterly on embedded emissions in imported goods
- Collect and verify detailed emissions data
- Establish systems for ongoing compliance

### Full Implementation (2026 onwards)

Starting in 2026, importers will need to:

- Submit verified emissions declarations
- Demonstrate compliance with all reporting requirements

From the first of February 2027, companies will have to buy the certificates for the year 2026. The certificate price will be based on the average cost of 2026.
It is essential that importers take this uncertainty into account.

* * *

## Frequently asked questions

### Which products are covered by CBAM?

CBAM initially covers imports of cement, iron and steel, aluminium, fertilizers, electricity, and hydrogen. The scope may expand to include additional sectors in the future. You can identify goods subject to CBAM in [our CBAM code identifier](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-cn-code-identifier).

### How do I calculate embedded emissions?

Emissions calculations must follow EU-approved methodologies, considering both direct and indirect emissions from production processes. Dubrink's platform automates these calculations according to EU standards.

### What are the penalties for non-compliance?

The European Union has established penalties for non-compliance with CBAM regulations, including fines, import restrictions, and other measures to address non-compliance.

### When do I need to purchase CBAM certificates?

Under the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM), importers must purchase CBAM certificates to cover the embedded emissions of their imported goods. Starting from February 1, 2027, importers will be required to purchase CBAM certificates for emissions generated in the year 2026.

### Cookie Settings

## Intuïtieve CBAM-rapportage

Bij Dubrink zijn we er voorstander om CBAM-rapportage te automatiseren. Dit noemen we intuïtieve CBAM-rapportage. We maken iets ingewikkelds als CBAM-naleving zo eenvoudig mogelijk, terwijl we tijd, risico’s en kosten minimaliseren. Met intuïtieve functies en aanpasbare opties faciliteren we gemakkelijke communicatie tussen importeurs, vertegenwoordigers, leveranciers en hun onderleveranciers op het importniveau. Volg en analyseer de CBAM-nalevingsstatus en zorg voor tijdige indiening van de vereiste documentatie, terwijl u nauwkeurige gegevens en bewijs ontvangt vanuit de hele toeleveringsketen.

![CBAM specialst Software xml](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-specialst-Software-xml-1.jpg)

![cbam compliance help](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-platform-reporting.png)

## Transformeer CBAM in een winnende vaardigheid

Of u nu een importeur, leverancier of vertegenwoordiger bent, ons platform biedt de tools en middelen om CBAM-regelgeving zelfverzekerd en efficiënt te navigeren. Het berekenen van emissies was nog nooit zo eenvoudig. Zowel importeurs als leveranciers besparen tijd doordat het Dubrink-systeem de meeste complexiteit wegneemt. Onze klanten zijn zeer tevreden met het platform van Dubrink. Sluit u vandaag nog bij ons aan en ervaar de voordelen van gestroomlijnd CBAM-nalevingsbeheer met Dubrink. Probeer de software vandaag nog gratis.

Onze intuïtieve oplossing revolutioneert de manier waarop u naleving beheert, waardoor het eenvoudiger en efficiënter wordt dan ooit tevoren. Krijg toegang tot krachtige functies en ontdek hoe ons platform uw processen kan stroomlijnen en u tijd kan besparen. U bent binnen enkele minuten operationeel!

Probeer nu Gratis

![Jan Joost den brinker](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/JJ-den-brinker.jpeg)

##### Jan-Joost den Brinker

#### Partner at Dubrink, CBAM Expert

Bij Dubrink hebben we een geavanceerd platform ontwikkeld om het CBAM-rapportageproces voor leveranciers, vertegenwoordigers en importeurs te stroomlijnen.

Ons doel is om klanten het best mogelijke platform te bieden om CBAM-regelgeving effectief en zelfverzekerd te navigeren. We werken samen met partners wereldwijd om ervoor te zorgen dat onze klanten de hoogste mate van ondersteuning en service ontvangen, waardoor naleving eenvoudiger en efficiënter wordt dan ooit tevoren.

![marcel duits](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/Scherm%C2%ADafbeelding-2024-07-19-om-11.25.50.png)

##### Marcel Duits

#### Partner at Dubrink, CBAM Expert

Bij Dubrink revolutioneren we CBAM-rapportage door een uitgebreid platform aan te bieden dat elke stap van het proces stroomlijnt. Onze software vraagt, ontvangt, valideert, berekent, rapporteert en slaat alle benodigde gegevens veilig op, waardoor u zowel tijd als geld bespaart. Door deze taken te automatiseren, verminderen we de last voor leveranciers, vertegenwoordigers en importeurs, zodat zij zich kunnen concentreren op hun kernactiviteiten.

We zijn een solide en transparant bedrijf en werken graag samen met andere experts, consultants, fabrieken, distributeurs en importeurs van over de hele wereld.

##### ★★★★★

[![](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Bendle-store-logo-black.png)](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Bendle-store-logo-black.png "")

3566

## Prezzi CBAM
# Prezzi

### Modulo Importatori

Se sei un importatore nell’UE con un piano a pagamento, tutti i tuoi fornitori possono ricevere le tue richieste di dati e fornirti **gratuitamente** i dati sulle emissioni.

Se sei un consulente o un esperto doganale, ti invitiamo gentilmente a contattarci, poiché offriamo piani flessibili specificamente adattati ai consulenti e agli esperti doganali.

Per il **modulo fornitori**, scorri verso il basso.

### Modulo Fornitori

Se sei un fornitore con un piano a pagamento, tutti i tuoi importatori nell’UE possono ricevere e richiedere **gratuitamente** i tuoi dati sulle emissioni.

Se sei un consulente o un esperto doganale, ti invitiamo gentilmente a contattarci, poiché offriamo piani flessibili specificamente adattati ai consulenti e agli esperti doganali.

3683

## CBAM Compliance Platform
# La piattaforma intelligente di conformità CBAM

Secondo le normative CBAM, gli importatori sono responsabili e devono rispondere dei dati forniti dai loro fornitori e subfornitori. La piattaforma di conformità CBAM di Dubrink aiuta gli importatori a far rispettare, verificare e automatizzare il calcolo dei dati sulle emissioni per ridurre la possibilità di sanzioni.

I fornitori e subfornitori effettuano i calcoli delle emissioni direttamente sulla piattaforma, con meccanismi di convalida automatizzati per autenticare i dati inseriti. Notifiche istantanee segnalano eventuali discrepanze per una risoluzione tempestiva. Sia gli importatori che i fornitori monitorano l’avanzamento della segnalazione dei dati tramite dashboard interattivi. Inoltre, i fornitori sono sollecitati a fornire prove a supporto, facilitando una segnalazione trasparente.

CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps - YouTube

Dubrink

54 subscribers

[CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=of3iCyS077c)

Dubrink

![cbam compliance management software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-management-software.png)

## Piattaforma conforme al CBAM

![cbam process route software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-process-route-software-1.png)

### Reporting intelligente della conformità

"STRUMENTO INNOVATIVO PER EVITARE RISCHI CBAM"

Invia i rapporti del Meccanismo di Adeguamento delle Emissioni di Carbonio (CBAM) con un clic, mentre i fornitori sono guidati nel sistema, riducendo gli errori e semplificando il processo. Gli importatori possono invitare fornitori e subfornitori, assistiti dalla nostra piattaforma, a presentare emissioni, prove e calcoli.

![cbam risks](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Proof-suppliers-cbam-reporting.png)

### Mitiga i rischi per gli importatori

**"CONSULENZA ESPERTA SU RICHIESTA, OGNI SECONDO"**

La piattaforma del Meccanismo di Adeguamento delle Emissioni di Carbonio di Dubrink minimizza i rischi CBAM per gli importatori, imponendo trasparenza, responsabilità dei fornitori, audit completi e rigorosa validazione. Queste misure garantiscono dati sulle emissioni accurati, riducendo il potenziale di sanzioni e problemi di conformità.

![CBAM proof suppliers calculation](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-calculation.png)

### Inserimento dati intuitivo

**"DUBRINK COMPILA I CAMPI PER TE."**

La piattaforma Dubrink semplifica il flusso di lavoro automatizzando l'inserimento dei dati. Compila proattivamente le informazioni dei fornitori, risparmiando tempo e riducendo errori. Dì addio all'inserimento manuale e accogli un processo più fluido e preciso. Scopri il futuro della gestione della conformità con Dubrink!

![cbam ai chat support](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-ai-chat-support.png)

### I consulenti migliori

**"LA PIATTAFORMA DI DUBRINK VI PROTEGGE DAI RISCHI."**

In Dubrink collaboriamo con consulenti di alto livello per garantire la massima qualità del servizio e delle competenze per i nostri clienti. Sei un consulente e vuoi unirti alla nostra piattaforma, leader nel settore? Iscriviti ora e diventa parte del nostro network di professionisti dedicati all'eccellenza e all'innovazione nella conformità CBAM.

![CBAM proof suppliers STORAGE](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-STORAGE.png)

### Piattaforma audit

"IL NOSTRO PUNTO DI FORZA PER LE ISPEZIONI."

Anche dopo che fornitori e gli importatori hanno proseguito, il nostro sistema conserva ogni dettaglio per i tuoi archivi storici e la prontezza agli audit. Con il software CBAM di Dubrink, puoi accedere a informazioni e approfondimenti quando ne hai bisogno. Collabora con Dubrink e sperimenta la sicurezza dei tuoi dati a lungo termine.

![proof suppliers cbam](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Proof-suppliers-cbam.png)

### Comunicazione fornitori

**"USARLO È UN GIOCO DA RAGAZZI!"**

Collegati facilmente con fornitori di paesi terzi usando il software CBAM di Dubrink. Accedi al database globale per integrare i dati CBAM dei fornitori non UE. La piattaforma consente ai fornitori di inserire direttamente i dati, offrendo promemoria automatici e dashboard per monitorare importazioni e fornitori.

## Gestione della conformità senza sforzo



#### Supporto esperto CBAM

Dubrink offre una vasta rete di talentuosi specialisti CBAM a supporto.



#### Facile da usare

Un'interfaccia intuitiva per una facile navigazione e reportistica senza problemi.



#### Consulenti CBAM

Questa piattaforma si integra bene con i consulenti CBAM. Risparmia tempo insieme.



#### Rapportare facilmente

Invio senza sforzo di rapporti CBAM e conformità semplificata, garantendo semplicità e precisione.



#### Automazione processi

Automazione efficiente di raccolta, validazione e reportistica dei dati per risparmiare tempo e risorse.



#### Mitigazione dei rischi

Garantiamo una reportistica precisa e dati validati affidabili per minimizzare i rischi CBAM.



#### Sicurezza dei dati

Robuste misure di sicurezza per proteggere i dati CBAM sensibili da accessi non autorizzati o violazioni.



#### Flessibilità e scalabilità

Una piattaforma flessibile che si adatta a esigenze specifiche e scalabile per crescere con l'azienda.



#### Pagamento in base all'uso

Modello di pagamento basato sull'uso, con flessibilità e convenienza per la piattaforma.

## CBAM Compliance Platform
# The Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform

## All-in-one CBAM compliance platform, purpose-built for CBAM

At Dubrink, we start with tech and innovation—fusing sustainability with deep insights
into customs, production processes, CBAM regulation, calculations, and analytics to build tools that
deliver real value.

### Automatic Data Exchange

Seamlessly exchange real-time CBAM data with your partners on the Dubrink platform. Always accurate, always up to date—no manual work needed.

### Reports & Analytics

Generate clear reports and use analytics to gain the edge. Make smarter CBAM decisions, faster than your competition.

### Emission Budgeting Tools

Forecast future emissions and related costs with smart budgeting tools. Stay ahead by planning your sustainability and compliance strategy proactively.

### Cloud Synchronization

Your data is always in sync across teams and locations. Access, edit, and share CBAM insights securely—anytime, anywhere.

### Alerts & Notifications

Automatically notify supply chain partners to provide or report emission data on time. No more delays, no more guesswork.

### Secure Storage

Robust security measures to protect sensitive CBAM data from unauthorized access or breaches.

### Work with tools you already use

Dubrink integrates seamlessly with your organization—multiple options, minimal effort. We've got you covered.

- Connect in days, not months - minimal IT effort required
- Fully compatible with ERPs, customs systems, and production software
- Integrate seamlessly without disrupting operations

![Dubrink Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/platform8.CE7n_xiB_14By1f.webp)

### Connected Ecosystem

Easily collaborate with suppliers and importers without exposing sensitive relationships.

### Always Compliant

Dubrink and CBAM evolve hand-in-hand, keeping you CBAM compliant as the regulation evolves.

### Privacy-First Architecture

Your data stays yours. Maintain full control over who sees what, with enterprise-grade security.

### Built-in Audit Trail

Every action is logged and traceable, giving you transparency in case of audits or cross-checks.

### Effortless Data Gathering

Easily collect CBAM data across your CBAM supply chain—often already available in Dubrink.

### Intuitive Design

A clean, user-friendly interface that works for everyone—regardless of technical background.

### Academy Access

Gain exclusive access to Dubrink’s CBAM Academy—tailored trainings that get your team up to speed, fast.

### On-Demand Expertise

Need guidance? Dubrink’s sharp, no-nonsense consultants are ready to solve issues quickly and efficiently.

### Ready to Scale

Whether you're a local player or a global enterprise, Dubrink grows with you.

This video shows the basic flow of Dubrink’s CBAM platform—but there’s much more under the hood. Book a demo to meet our team and see how we can tailor it to your needs.

> Dubrink's comprehensive approach to CBAM is great. They provide essential guidance through every step of the process, from initial calculations to generating the final XML file. As a consultant, I primarily use the platform for calculation and XML file preparation, and I'm particularly impressed by its consistent updates to the latest EU requirements. These regular updates ensure that my declarations are both quick and accurate.

## CBAM Compliance Made Easy
# Su Dubrink

La missione di Dubrink è semplificare la conformità CBAM, rendendola più facile, economica e accurata per le aziende. Offriamo soluzioni innovative e strumenti user-friendly per ottimizzare il processo di reportistica CBAM, affinché importatori, fornitori e rappresentanti possano soddisfare efficacemente i requisiti normativi. Utilizzando tecnologie avanzate e competenze specifiche, ci impegniamo a supportare i nostri clienti nel soddisfare senza problemi gli obblighi CBAM, portando infine al successo in un contesto normativo complesso.

## Reportistica CBAM intuitiva

Dubrink preferisce evitare consulenze sulla tecnologia; invece, utilizziamo la tecnologia per automatizzare la reportistica CBAM. Questa la chiamiamo reportistica CBAM intuitiva. Rendiamo qualcosa di complesso come la conformità CBAM il più semplice possibile, minimizzando tempi, rischi e costi.

Con funzionalità intuitive e opzioni personalizzabili, facilitiamo la comunicazione tra importatori, rappresentanti, fornitori e i loro sub-fornitori a livello di importazione. Monitora e analizza lo stato della conformità CBAM e assicurati che la documentazione richiesta venga presentata tempestivamente, ricevendo dati accurati e prove da tutta la catena di approvvigionamento.

![CBAM specialst Software xml](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-specialst-Software-xml-1.jpg)

![cbam compliance help](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-platform-reporting.png)

## Trasforma il CBAM in una competenza vincente

Che tu sia un importatore, un fornitore o un rappresentante, la nostra piattaforma offre tutti gli strumenti e le risorse per navigare con sicurezza ed efficienza le normative CBAM. Calcolare le emissioni non è mai stato così semplice. Sia gli importatori che i fornitori risparmiano tempo poiché il sistema Dubrink elimina gran parte della complessità. I nostri clienti sono molto soddisfatti della piattaforma Dubrink. Unisciti a noi oggi stesso e scopri i vantaggi di una gestione della conformità CBAM ottimizzata con Dubrink. Prova il software gratuitamente oggi stesso.

## CBAM Pricing Overview
# Angebot:

### Importeursmodul

Identifizieren Sie schnell Waren, die dem CBAM unterliegen, sammeln Sie aktuelle Daten von Lieferanten, optimieren Sie Ihre Einkaufsstrategie für CBAM-Waren und erstellen Sie umfassende CBAM-Berichte – alles innerhalb weniger Minuten.

Wenn Sie ein Importeur mit einem kostenpflichtigen Plan sind, können all Ihre Lieferanten Ihre Datenanforderungen erhalten und Ihnen **kostenlos** Emissionsdaten bereitstellen.

Für **Lieferantenpreise** scrollen Sie bitte nach unten.

Wenn Sie ein Berater oder Zollexperte sind, bitten wir Sie, uns zu kontaktieren, da wir flexible Pläne anbieten, die speziell auf Berater und Zollexperten zugeschnitten sind.

### Lieferantenmodul

Wenn Sie ein Lieferant mit einem kostenpflichtigen Plan sind, können alle Ihre Importeure **kostenlos** Emissionsdaten empfangen und anfordern.

Wenn Sie ein Berater oder Zollexperte sind, bitten wir Sie, uns zu kontaktieren, da wir flexible Pläne anbieten, die speziell auf Berater und Zollexperten zugeschnitten sind.

3681

## CBAM Pricing Information
## Prijzen

### Importeursmodule

**Als u een importeur bent in de EU met een starters plan of hoger, kunnen al uw leveranciers uw gegevensverzoeken ontvangen en u gratis emissiegegevens verstrekken.**

Als u een consultant of douane-expert bent, verzoeken wij u vriendelijk contact met ons op te nemen, aangezien wij flexibele plannen aanbieden die specifiek zijn afgestemd op consultants en douane-experts.

Voor de **leveranciersmodule**, scroll omlaag.

### Leveranciersmodule

Als u een leverancier bent met een betaald plan, kunnen al uw importeurs in de EU **gratis** uw emissiegegevens ontvangen en aanvragen.

Als u een consultant of douane-expert bent, verzoeken wij u vriendelijk contact met ons op te nemen, aangezien wij flexibele plannen aanbieden die specifiek zijn afgestemd op consultants en douane-experts.

3685

## Intuitive CBAM Reporting
# Über Dubrink

Bei Dubrink ziehen wir es vor, nicht über Technologie zu sprechen, sondern Technologie einzusetzen, um das CBAM-Reporting zu automatisieren. Man könnte es intuitives CBAM-Reporting nennen. Wir machen etwas so Kompliziertes wie CBAM-Compliance so einfach wie möglich und minimieren so Zeit, Risiken und Kosten.

Mit intuitiven Funktionen und anpassbaren Optionen erleichtern wir die Kommunikation zwischen Importeuren, Agenten, Lieferanten und deren Unterlieferanten auf der Ebene der Importkette. Verfolgen und analysieren Sie den Status der CBAM-Compliance und stellen Sie sicher, dass die erforderlichen Dokumente rechtzeitig eingereicht werden, indem Sie genaue Daten und Nachweise aus der gesamten Lieferkette erhalten.

## Intuitive CBAM-Berichterstattung

Bei Dubrink ziehen wir es vor, nicht über Technologie zu sprechen, sondern Technologie einzusetzen, um das CBAM-Reporting zu automatisieren. Man könnte es intuitives CBAM-Reporting nennen. Wir machen etwas so Kompliziertes wie CBAM-Compliance so einfach wie möglich und minimieren so Zeit, Risiken und Kosten.

Mit intuitiven Funktionen und anpassbaren Optionen erleichtern wir die Kommunikation zwischen Importeuren, Agenten, Lieferanten und deren Unterlieferanten auf der Ebene der Importkette. Verfolgen und analysieren Sie den Status der CBAM-Compliance und stellen Sie sicher, dass die erforderlichen Dokumente rechtzeitig eingereicht werden, indem Sie genaue Daten und Nachweise aus der gesamten Lieferkette erhalten.

3563

## Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism
# Wat is CBAM?

CBAM staat voor **Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism.** Het is een beleidsinstrument voorgesteld door de Europese Unie om te voorkomen dat bedrijven verhuizen naar gebieden met lagere milieu-normen om de kosten van koolstofuitstoot te vermijden. CBAM stelt een eerlijke prijs in voor de koolstof die vrijkomt bij de productie van koolstofintensievere goederen die de EU binnenkomen, en moedigt schonere industriële productie in landen buiten de EU aan.

Aanvankelijk richt CBAM zich op sectoren met hoge emissies en handelsrisico’s. Bepaalde afgeleide producten zoals deuren, schroeven, ramen, blikken, dozen en bouten vallen in sommige sectoren onder de CBAM-wetgeving. De reikwijdte van CBAM zal geleidelijk uitbreiden. Verwacht dat ook glas, plastic en andere producten in de toekomst worden opgenomen.

YouTube

Search

Info

Shopping

Tap to unmute

If playback doesn't begin shortly, try restarting your device.

This video is unavailable

[Watch on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E5x-4a1bV7Q "Watch on YouTube")

[Probeer Gratis](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-software-pricing/)

![cbam compliance management software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-management-software.png)

## Heeft CBAM invloed op uw bedrijf?

Gebruik onze CBAM Identifier Tool om daar achter te komen. Maak een gratis account aan op het Dubrink-platform en krijg toegang tot CBAM-checks. In tegenstelling tot dure adviesdiensten die vaak duizenden euro’s kosten om te bepalen of uw bedrijf CBAM-conform is, bieden wij ondersteuning via een intuïtief hulpmiddel. Met slechts een paar klikken kunt u snel vaststellen of uw importen onder CBAM-regels vallen.

## Wat is CBAM precies?

Vanaf januari 2026 mogen alleen goedgekeurde CBAM-aangifters goederen importeren die onder CBAM-regels vallen. Aanvankelijk geldt CBAM voor Cement, Elektriciteit, Kunstmest, IJzer en Staal, Aluminium en Waterstof. Uw bedrijf moet deze status aanvragen. Na goedkeuring moet u regelmatig rapporteren over de emissies van uw importen. Om deze te berekenen, moet u weten welke emissies vrijkomen tijdens de productie. Op basis van deze emissies moeten importeurs CBAM-certificaten aanschaffen en rapporteren. Daarnaast moet u aan het einde van elk kwartaal minstens 80% van de certificaten voor uw importen bezitten.

## Wat moet u doen?

- Importeurs moeten zich aanmelden als goedgekeurde CBAM-rapporteurs.
- Importeurs moeten precies weten wat de emissiegegevens zijn van al hun niet-EU leveranciers en de onderleveranciers van hun leveranciers als een hoofdleverancier CBAM-goederen van deze onderleveranciers koopt.
- Bereken de totale hoeveelheid goederen die binnen een specifieke periode zijn geïmporteerd.
- Bereken de vele variabelen met betrekking tot directe en indirecte emissies.
-  Vraag de koolstofprijs op in het land van herkomst voor de ingesloten emissies.
- Dien CBAM-rapporten in bij de lokale autoriteit en koop certificaten om de koolstofemissies te compenseren.

## Is dat alles?

Nou, niet echt. Dit is pas het begin. Laten we de operationele stappen beschrijven.

##### 1\. Verdeel de installatie van uw leverancier in aparte productieprocessen met duidelijke systeemgrenzen.

Importeurs moeten alle leveranciers en onderleveranciers identificeren en de activiteiten van deze leveranciers splitsen in zogenaamde ‘installaties’. Bijvoorbeeld, de productie van Cement Clinker kan proces één zijn, waarbij de productie van Portland Cement, dat gedeeltelijk uit Cement Clinker bestaat, een tweede productieproces is.

##### 2a. Identificeer relevante parameters en methoden en monitor deze.

Nu u alle processen zijn geïdentificeerd, moet u de gegevens van deze processen verzamelen en monitoren. CBAM vereist dat u informatie verzamelt over de directe emissies van brandstoffen en materialen, directe emissies gerelateerd aan warmteflows, afvalgassen, elektriciteit geproduceerd door de installatie en indirecte emissies gerelateerd aan elektriciteitsverbruik. Als een leverancier een CBAM-goed als input voor de productie gebruikt, de zogenaamde precursor, moet de leverancier dezelfde variabelen voor de productie van dat CBAM-goed bepalen en monitoren. Als de leverancier het van een onderleverancier koopt, moet de leverancier ervoor zorgen dat de onderleverancier de gegevens monitort en verzamelt.

##### 2b. Identificeer relevante parameters en methoden en monitor deze.

Er zijn drie manieren om de directe emissies te monitoren of te bepalen. Twee daarvan zijn gebaseerd op berekening: de Standaardmethode en de Massa Balans Methode. Een derde optie is een meetmethode, genaamd het Continue Emissiemonitoringsysteem. We zullen deze in meer detail uitleggen in ons Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform.

##### 3\. Wijs emissies toe aan productieprocessen.

De importeur moet zowel directe als indirecte emissies berekenen op basis van de verzamelde gegevens. Deze taak kan complex en tijdrovend zijn, vooral met veel leveranciers. De Intelligent CBAM Compliance Software van Dubrink vereenvoudigt dit proces door emissies te berekenen op basis van gevalideerde leveranciersgegevens, waardoor tijd en moeite voor de importeur worden bespaard.

##### 4\. Voeg de specifieke ingesloten emissies van relevante precursors toe.

Het is belangrijk om eerst te onderscheiden of het goed een eenvoudig goed is of een complex goed dat precursors als invoer gebruikt. In het geval van een complex goed moeten zowel de specifieke ingesloten emissies van het geproduceerde goed als de specifieke ingesloten emissies van de precursors worden berekend. Houd er rekening mee dat de importeur verantwoordelijk is voor de juiste gegevens en berekeningen.

##### 5\. Bepaal de specifieke ingesloten emissies van CBAM-goederen en dien de gegevens in bij de lokale autoriteit.

U weet nu de emissies van precursors en de emissies die direct en indirect verband houden met de goederen. De laatste stap is om de emissie per product te berekenen en het resultaat bij de lokale autoriteiten in te dienen. Vergeet niet om aanvullende documenten zoals bewijs van meting, bewijs van berekening en bewijs van betaling van de CO2-prijs in het land van herkomst in te dienen. Hoe u dit gemakkelijk kan doen is door middel van het Dubrink Platform.

##### CBAM Compliance Platform

Het platform van Dubrink vereenvoudigt de naleving van CBAM door het verzamelen, berekenen, valideren en organiseren van CBAM-emissiegegevens tussen importeurs, leveranciers en vertegenwoordigers.

[Probeer Gratis](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-software-pricing/)



#### Expert Support

#### Support

## Beperk uw risico!

Importeurs lopen aanzienlijke risico’s onder CBAM. Het documenteren en valideren van leveranciersgegevens, inclusief invoer, berekeningen en ondersteunende documenten, is cruciaal. Audits kunnen jaren later plaatsvinden, waardoor bewijs van berekeningen en opslag essentieel is. Het verzamelen van informatie van alle leveranciers en onderleveranciers is tijdrovend. Het Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform van Dubrink stroomlijnt dit proces.

![CBAM proof suppliers STORAGE](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-STORAGE.png)

## CBAM Compliance Platform

![cbam process route software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-process-route-software-1.png)

### Slim rapporteren

"Slim, snel en gemakkelijk CBAM Rapporteren"

Dien CBAM-rapporten moeiteloos in met slechts één klik, terwijl fouten worden geminimaliseerd en de algehele procedure wordt vereenvoudigd. Importeurs kunnen leveranciers en hun onderleveranciers uitnodigen, geholpen door ons platform, om hun emissies, bewijsstukken en berekeningen in te dienen.

![cbam risks](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Proof-suppliers-cbam-reporting.png)

### Verklein je risico's

"EXPERT ADVIES OP AANVRAAG"

Dubrink biedt een reeks aan consultants aan die zich hebben aangesloten bij ons platform. Versterk je positie en contact experts in het land van oorsprong voor verificatie en audits. Dit gaat gemakkelijk met een druk op de knop in het CBAM Rapportageplatform van Dubrink.

![CBAM proof suppliers calculation](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-calculation.png)

### Een intuïtief platform

"DUBRINK VULT DE LEGE VELDEN OP"

Indien het voor de importeur onmogelijk is om emissiedata te vergaren, ondanks de hulp van Dubrink en ondanks de hulp van je consultant, dan heb je geen andere optie hebben dan de 'default values' in te vullen. Het platform vult automatisch de lege plekken in zodat u ten alle tijden kunt rapporteren.

![cbam ai chat support](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-ai-chat-support.png)

### AI CBAM Consultant

"Dubrink's platform verlaagt de risico's."

Het CBAM-platform van Dubrink minimaliseert de risico's voor importeurs door transparantie, verantwoordelijkheid van leveranciers en indien gewenst audits en validatie te faciliteren. Deze opties zorgen voor nauwkeurige emissiegegevens, waardoor de kans op boetes en nalevingsproblemen wordt verkleind.

![CBAM proof suppliers STORAGE](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-STORAGE.png)

### Behoud Bewijsstukken

"zo wordt een audit een fluitje van een cent"

Zelfs nadat leveranciers en importeurs verder zijn gegaan, bewaart ons systeem elk detail voor je historische records en auditgereedheid. Met de CBAM-compliancesoftware van Dubrink kun je altijd belangrijke inzichten en informatie opvragen wanneer dat nodig is. Start vandaag nog met Dubrink en begin met de zekerheid dat je gegevens veilig zijn voor de lange termijn.

![proof suppliers cbam](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Proof-suppliers-cbam.png)

### Gemakkelijk communiceren

"Werken met Dubrink is gemakkelijk!"

Ontvang gemakkelijk data van leveranciers uit derde landen met behulp van Dubrink. Krijg toegang tot onze wereldwijde leveranciersdatabase voor eenvoudige identificatie en integratie van CBAM-gegevens van niet-EU-leveranciers. Ons platform stelt leveranciers in staat om direct relevante CBAM-gegevens in te voeren, terwijl geautomatiseerde herinneringen de aanvraag ondersteunen.

## CBAM Compliance Platform
# The Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform

## All-in-one CBAM compliance platform, purpose-built for CBAM

At Dubrink, we start with tech and innovation—fusing sustainability with deep insights
into customs, production processes, CBAM regulation, calculations, and analytics to build tools that
deliver real value.

### Automatic Data Exchange

Seamlessly exchange real-time CBAM data with your partners on the Dubrink platform. Always accurate, always up to date—no manual work needed.

### Reports & Analytics

Generate clear reports and use analytics to gain the edge. Make smarter CBAM decisions, faster than your competition.

### Emission Budgeting Tools

Forecast future emissions and related costs with smart budgeting tools. Stay ahead by planning your sustainability and compliance strategy proactively.

### Cloud Synchronization

Your data is always in sync across teams and locations. Access, edit, and share CBAM insights securely—anytime, anywhere.

### Alerts & Notifications

Automatically notify supply chain partners to provide or report emission data on time. No more delays, no more guesswork.

### Secure Storage

Robust security measures to protect sensitive CBAM data from unauthorized access or breaches.

### Work with tools you already use

Dubrink integrates seamlessly with your organization—multiple options, minimal effort. We've got you covered.

- Connect in days, not months - minimal IT effort required
- Fully compatible with ERPs, customs systems, and production software
- Integrate seamlessly without disrupting operations

![Dubrink Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/platform8.CE7n_xiB_14By1f.webp)

### Connected Ecosystem

Easily collaborate with suppliers and importers without exposing sensitive relationships.

### Always Compliant

Dubrink and CBAM evolve hand-in-hand, keeping you CBAM compliant as the regulation evolves.

### Privacy-First Architecture

Your data stays yours. Maintain full control over who sees what, with enterprise-grade security.

### Built-in Audit Trail

Every action is logged and traceable, giving you transparency in case of audits or cross-checks.

### Effortless Data Gathering

Easily collect CBAM data across your CBAM supply chain—often already available in Dubrink.

### Intuitive Design

A clean, user-friendly interface that works for everyone—regardless of technical background.

### Academy Access

Gain exclusive access to Dubrink’s CBAM Academy—tailored trainings that get your team up to speed, fast.

### On-Demand Expertise

Need guidance? Dubrink’s sharp, no-nonsense consultants are ready to solve issues quickly and efficiently.

### Ready to Scale

Whether you're a local player or a global enterprise, Dubrink grows with you.

## Efficient CBAM Compliance Software
# Avoid Problems with Dubrink’s CBAM Software

CBAM software is essential in a world of CBAM compliance where importers face numerous challenges. How does an importer ensure that suppliers provide the correct data? How can an importer be sure that the right calculation methods, monitoring, and reporting methods are being applied? This complexity can lead to confusion and inefficiencies in the CBAM process, causing importers to lose valuable time and resources.

CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps - YouTube

Dubrink

54 subscribers

[CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=of3iCyS077c)

[Try for free!](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-software-pricing/)

![cbam compliance management software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-management-software.png)

## CBAM Software & Data Management and Transparency

Fortunately, Dubrink’s [CBAM software](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-compliance-platform/) offers a CBAM software solution to these challenges. Our CBAM software provides an overview of the data and choices of suppliers and subcontractors. Since it’s the importer responsible for complying with CBAM rules, it’s logical that if the provided CBAM data is incorrect, penalties will follow for that importer. Working with Dubrink’s CBAM software is reassuring, and it contributes to CBAM compliance. On one hand, suppliers and subcontractors, who are not always visible to the importer, can be asked to provide their data. If incorrect data is reported, there’s a high chance that Dubrink’s software will flag an unusual data entry by a supplier. This will allow suppliers to correct their mistake. Additionally, Dubrink can track down who provided incorrect data years later. This allows the importer ad supplier  to intervene and address the respective supplier or subcontractor.

## CBAM Compliance Platform

![cbam process route software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-process-route-software-1.png)

### Slim rapporteren

"Slim, snel en gemakkelijk CBAM Rapporteren"

![cbam risks](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Proof-suppliers-cbam-reporting.png)

![Indirect Emission Calculator](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Indirect-Emission-Calculator-2.png)

## Hoe we uw leveranciers bij de hand nemen?

Onjuiste gegevens van leveranciers kunnen ernstige gevolgen hebben voor importeurs, zoals boetes van de Europese Commissie. Leveranciers moeten bewijzen en berekeningen leveren, die ons platform valideert. Als er problemen zijn, informeren we de importeur en leverancier om fouten te voorkomen. Onze proactieve aanpak in samenwerking met uw consultant helpt importeurs en leveranciers om te voldoen aan de regelgeving en boetes te vermijden, waardoor bedrijfsintegriteit en financiële stabiliteit behouden blijven.

Navigate CBAM compliance with confidence through Dubrink's network of expert consultants. We deliver strategic insights, proactive risk management, and hands-on problem solving to help you master carbon border regulations—whether you use our platform or not.

In today's complex regulatory environment, successful CBAM compliance sometimes requires more than just software—it demands expert guidance and practical support. Dubrink's consulting services combine deep regulatory knowledge with hands-on experience to help you overcome any compliance challenge.

## CBAM Doctor Live
# CBAM Doctor - Live

Join our weekly CBAM Doctor Live session, where one of our specialists answers your questions in real time. No appointments, no waiting—just expert advice to help you navigate CBAM challenges quickly and effectively. Tune in, ask your questions, and get the guidance you need!

![The Dubrink CBAM Doctor allows you to get answers to CBAM questions from real experts for free](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/cbam-doctor.Ge62IMKl_Z2je1Ke.webp)

## What is the CBAM Doctor?

Navigating CBAM regulations can be challenging, and we know there are many questions. That’s why we’re offering CBAM Doc Live—a **free** online consultation session where one of our specialists answers your questions live.
Each session lasts one hour, during which we aim to help as many people as possible. To ensure a smooth experience, we have a limited number of spots available per session. That’s why we operate on a ticket system—secure your spot by booking through the button below.

## About Dubrink

Under CBAM, importers are obligated to acquire accurate data reflecting the correct factory setup (including installations and processes) and calculate data according to the calculation method desired by the EU.
[Dubrink’s Intelligent CBAM Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-platform) manages the request, calculation, validation, mapping, submission, and storage of emission data, ensuring that evidence can be readily provided during audits years later.
Dubrink’s platform is a unique platform that guides both importers and suppliers through the CBAM process in a seamless manner that is fully compliant with EU regulations.

## Register Now

- For Importers & Suppliers
- Every Thursday 10.00 GMT +1 (subject to availability)
- **Free** appointment

[Register Here](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-doctor-link)

Help us provide relevant ads and marketing based on your interests.

## CBAM Compliance Platform
# The Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform

## All-in-one CBAM compliance platform, purpose-built for CBAM

At Dubrink, we start with tech and innovation—fusing sustainability with deep insights
into customs, production processes, CBAM regulation, calculations, and analytics to build tools that
deliver real value.

### Automatic Data Exchange

Seamlessly exchange real-time CBAM data with your partners on the Dubrink platform. Always accurate, always up to date—no manual work needed.

### Reports & Analytics

Generate clear reports and use analytics to gain the edge. Make smarter CBAM decisions, faster than your competition.

### Emission Budgeting Tools

Forecast future emissions and related costs with smart budgeting tools. Stay ahead by planning your sustainability and compliance strategy proactively.

### Cloud Synchronization

Your data is always in sync across teams and locations. Access, edit, and share CBAM insights securely—anytime, anywhere.

### Alerts & Notifications

Automatically notify supply chain partners to provide or report emission data on time. No more delays, no more guesswork.

### Secure Storage

Robust security measures to protect sensitive CBAM data from unauthorized access or breaches.

### Work with tools you already use

Dubrink integrates seamlessly with your organization—multiple options, minimal effort. We've got you covered.

- Connect in days, not months - minimal IT effort required
- Fully compatible with ERPs, customs systems, and production software
- Integrate seamlessly without disrupting operations

![Dubrink Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/platform8.CE7n_xiB_14By1f.webp)

### Connected Ecosystem

Easily collaborate with suppliers and importers without exposing sensitive relationships.

### Always Compliant

Dubrink and CBAM evolve hand-in-hand, keeping you CBAM compliant as the regulation evolves.

### Privacy-First Architecture

Your data stays yours. Maintain full control over who sees what, with enterprise-grade security.

### Built-in Audit Trail

Every action is logged and traceable, giving you transparency in case of audits or cross-checks.

### Effortless Data Gathering

Easily collect CBAM data across your CBAM supply chain—often already available in Dubrink.

### Intuitive Design

A clean, user-friendly interface that works for everyone—regardless of technical background.

### Academy Access

Gain exclusive access to Dubrink’s CBAM Academy—tailored trainings that get your team up to speed, fast.

### On-Demand Expertise

Need guidance? Dubrink’s sharp, no-nonsense consultants are ready to solve issues quickly and efficiently.

### Ready to Scale

Whether you're a local player or a global enterprise, Dubrink grows with you.

## Leverage Dubrink's CBAM ecosystem

Join Dubrink's ecosystem and benefit from our end-to-end CBAM compliance solutions.

Report, calculate, communicate, and forecast—all in one place. Fully automated, with access to audit and verification, ensuring compliance in just a few clicks.

## Dubrink's Global Presence

A map of Dubrink's extensive global ecosystem.Dubrink's Global Ecosystem covers most countries in the world, highlighting its significant coverage across the world.

## No need to start from zero—just connect and go

Your business partner is often already in the platform.

Just connect, access emissions data, and get local support when needed.

500K+Import lines processed

1K+Companies connected

30+Dubrink consultants

> Dubrink's comprehensive approach to CBAM is great. They provide essential guidance through every step of the process, from initial calculations to generating the final XML file. As a consultant, I primarily use the platform for calculation and XML file preparation, and I'm particularly impressed by its consistent updates to the latest EU requirements. These regular updates ensure that my declarations are both quick and accurate.

![Luigi Villani reviews the Dubrink platform](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/lv.BWTLVmty_16egVF.webp)

Luigi VillaniManaging Partner, GTG Consulting

### Best-in-class platform

Streamline CBAM compliance with Dubrink's all-in-one platform. Combine automation, precise calculations, forecasting and cloud collaboration to streamline your reporting process and save valuable time.

- Automate compliance, save time
- Accurate calculation for precise emissions reporting
- Effortless collaboration across the supply chain
- Powerful analytics and forecasting tools to plan ahead

Navigate CBAM with confidence through our network of expert consultants. We combine strategic insights, proactive risk management, and tailored solutions to help you master carbon border regulations.

- Full-service compliance tailored to your needs.
- Identify risks before they become problems.
- Strategic insights to optimize your CBAM processes.

Elevate your CBAM expertise with our focused training programs. From core regulations to supplier onboarding and consulting skills, we provide the knowledge you need to navigate carbon border compliance with confidence.

- Learn the rules, master compliance.
- Supplier and sub-supplier training and onboarding
- Applied CBAM for consultants

## CBAM Compliance Platform
# The Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform

## All-in-one CBAM compliance platform, purpose-built for CBAM

At Dubrink, we start with tech and innovation—fusing sustainability with deep insights
into customs, production processes, CBAM regulation, calculations, and analytics to build tools that
deliver real value.

### Automatic Data Exchange

Seamlessly exchange real-time CBAM data with your partners on the Dubrink platform. Always accurate, always up to date—no manual work needed.

### Reports & Analytics

Generate clear reports and use analytics to gain the edge. Make smarter CBAM decisions, faster than your competition.

### Emission Budgeting Tools

Forecast future emissions and related costs with smart budgeting tools. Stay ahead by planning your sustainability and compliance strategy proactively.

### Cloud Synchronization

Your data is always in sync across teams and locations. Access, edit, and share CBAM insights securely—anytime, anywhere.

### Alerts & Notifications

Automatically notify supply chain partners to provide or report emission data on time. No more delays, no more guesswork.

### Secure Storage

Robust security measures to protect sensitive CBAM data from unauthorized access or breaches.

### Work with tools you already use

Dubrink integrates seamlessly with your organization—multiple options, minimal effort. We've got you covered.

- Connect in days, not months - minimal IT effort required
- Fully compatible with ERPs, customs systems, and production software
- Integrate seamlessly without disrupting operations

![Dubrink Platform](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/platform8.CE7n_xiB_14By1f.webp)

### Connected Ecosystem

Easily collaborate with suppliers and importers without exposing sensitive relationships.

### Always Compliant

Dubrink and CBAM evolve hand-in-hand, keeping you CBAM compliant as the regulation evolves.

### Privacy-First Architecture

Your data stays yours. Maintain full control over who sees what, with enterprise-grade security.

### Built-in Audit Trail

Every action is logged and traceable, giving you transparency in case of audits or cross-checks.

### Effortless Data Gathering

Easily collect CBAM data across your CBAM supply chain—often already available in Dubrink.

### Intuitive Design

A clean, user-friendly interface that works for everyone—regardless of technical background.

### Academy Access

Gain exclusive access to Dubrink’s CBAM Academy—tailored trainings that get your team up to speed, fast.

### On-Demand Expertise

Need guidance? Dubrink’s sharp, no-nonsense consultants are ready to solve issues quickly and efficiently.

### Ready to Scale

Whether you're a local player or a global enterprise, Dubrink grows with you.

## Understanding CBAM
# **Was ist CBAM?**

CBAM steht für Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism. Es ist ein von der Europäischen Union vorgeschlagenes politisches Instrument, um zu verhindern, dass Unternehmen in Regionen mit niedrigeren Umweltstandards abwandern, um die Kosten für Kohlenstoffemissionen zu vermeiden. CBAM legt einen fairen Preis für den Kohlenstoff fest, der bei der Herstellung kohlenstoffintensiver Waren entsteht, die in die EU gelangen, und fördert eine sauberere industrielle Produktion in Ländern außerhalb der EU.

Anfangs konzentriert sich CBAM auf Sektoren mit hohen Emissionen und Handelsrisiken. Bestimmte abgeleitete Produkte wie Türen, Schrauben, Fenster, Dosen, Kisten und Bolzen fallen in einigen Sektoren unter die CBAM-Gesetzgebung. Der Anwendungsbereich von CBAM wird schrittweise erweitert. Es wird erwartet, dass in Zukunft auch Glas, Kunststoff und andere Produkte einbezogen werden.

CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps - YouTube

Dubrink

54 subscribers

[CBAM Reporting in 5 simple steps](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=of3iCyS077c)

Dubrink

[Kostenlos Testen](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-software-pricing/)

![cbam compliance management software](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/cbam-compliance-management-software.png)

## Hat CBAM Auswirkungen auf Ihr Unternehmen?

Verwenden Sie unser CBAM Identifier Tool! Erstellen Sie ein kostenloses Konto auf der Dubrink-Plattform und erhalten Sie Zugang zu unbegrenzten CBAM-Prüfungen. Im Gegensatz zu teuren Beratungsdiensten, die oft Tausende von Euro kosten, um festzustellen, ob Ihr Unternehmen CBAM-konform ist, bieten wir Unterstützung durch ein intuitives Tool. Mit nur wenigen Klicks können Sie schnell feststellen, ob Ihre Importe unter die CBAM-Regeln fallen.

Wenn Sie das Tool nützlich finden, empfehlen wir Ihnen, unser Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform zu erkunden, das darauf ausgelegt ist, Ihre Compliance-Bemühungen weiter zu optimieren und Ihnen Zeit und Geld zu sparen.

### Was genau ist CBAM?

Ab Januar 2026 dürfen nur genehmigte CBAM-Erklärer Waren importieren, die unter die CBAM-Regeln fallen. CBAM gilt zunächst für Zement, Elektrizität, Düngemittel, Eisen und Stahl, Aluminium und Wasserstoff. Ihr Unternehmen muss diesen Status beantragen. Nach der Genehmigung müssen Sie regelmäßig über die Emissionen Ihrer Importe berichten. Um diese zu berechnen, müssen Sie wissen, welche Emissionen während der Produktion freigesetzt werden. Auf Basis dieser Emissionen müssen Importeure CBAM-Zertifikate erwerben und darüber berichten. Außerdem müssen Sie am Ende jedes Quartals mindestens 80 % der Zertifikate für Ihre Importe besitzen.

## Was müssen Sie tun?

- Importeure müssen sich als genehmigte CBAM-Berichterstatter registrieren.
- Importeure müssen genau wissen, welche Emissionsdaten alle ihre Nicht-EU-Lieferanten und die Unterlieferanten ihrer Lieferanten haben, wenn ein Hauptlieferant CBAM-Waren von diesen Unterlieferanten kauft.
- Berechnen Sie die Gesamtmenge der innerhalb eines bestimmten Zeitraums importierten Waren.
- Berechnen Sie die vielen Variablen in Bezug auf direkte und indirekte Emissionen.
- Ermitteln Sie den Kohlenstoffpreis im Herkunftsland für die eingeschlossenen Emissionen.
- Reichen Sie CBAM-Berichte bei der örtlichen Behörde ein und kaufen Sie Zertifikate, um die Kohlenstoffemissionen zu kompensieren.

## Ist das alles?

Nun, nicht wirklich. Das ist erst der Anfang. Lassen Sie uns die betrieblichen Schritte näher betrachten.

##### 1\. Teilen Sie die Anlage Ihres Lieferanten in separate Produktionsprozesse mit klaren Systemgrenzen auf.

Importeure müssen alle Lieferanten und Unterlieferanten identifizieren und die Aktivitäten dieser Lieferanten in sogenannte „Anlagen“ unterteilen. Zum Beispiel kann die Produktion von Zementklinker Prozess eins sein, während die Produktion von Portlandzement, der teilweise aus Zementklinker besteht, ein zweiter Produktionsprozess ist.

##### 2a. Relevante Parameter und Methoden identifizieren und überwachen.

Nachdem Sie alle Prozesse identifiziert haben, müssen Sie die Daten dieser Prozesse sammeln und überwachen. CBAM erfordert, dass Sie Informationen über die direkten Emissionen von Brennstoffen und Materialien, direkte Emissionen im Zusammenhang mit Wärmeflüssen, Abgase, von der Anlage erzeugten Strom und indirekte Emissionen im Zusammenhang mit dem Stromverbrauch sammeln. Wenn ein Lieferant ein CBAM-Produkt als Input für die Produktion verwendet, den sogenannten Vorläufer, muss der Lieferant dieselben Variablen für die Produktion dieses CBAM-Produkts bestimmen und überwachen. Wenn der Lieferant es von einem Unterlieferanten kauft, muss der Lieferant sicherstellen, dass der Unterlieferant die Daten überwacht und sammelt.

##### 2b. Relevante Parameter und Methoden identifizieren und überwachen.

Es gibt drei Methoden zur Überwachung oder Bestimmung der direkten Emissionen. Zwei davon basieren auf Berechnung: die Standardmethode und die Massenbilanzmethode. Eine dritte Option ist eine Messmethode, genannt das kontinuierliche Emissionsüberwachungssystem. Wir werden diese in unserem Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform ausführlicher erklären.

##### Emissionen Produktionsprozessen zuweisen.

Der Importeur muss sowohl direkte als auch indirekte Emissionen auf der Grundlage der gesammelten Daten berechnen. Diese Aufgabe kann komplex und zeitaufwendig sein, besonders bei vielen Lieferanten. Die Intelligent CBAM Compliance Software von Dubrink vereinfacht diesen Prozess, indem sie Emissionen auf der Grundlage validierter Lieferantendaten berechnet, wodurch Zeit und Aufwand für den Importeur gespart werden.

##### 4\. Fügen Sie die spezifischen eingeschlossenen Emissionen relevanter Vorläufer hinzu.

Es ist zunächst wichtig zu unterscheiden, ob das Produkt ein einfaches Produkt oder ein komplexes Produkt ist, das Vorläufer als Eingabe verwendet. Im Falle eines komplexen Produkts müssen sowohl die spezifischen eingeschlossenen Emissionen des hergestellten Produkts als auch die spezifischen eingeschlossenen Emissionen der Vorläufer berechnet werden. Beachten Sie, dass der Importeur für die richtigen Daten und Berechnungen verantwortlich ist.

##### 5\. Bestimmen Sie die spezifischen eingeschlossenen Emissionen von CBAM-Produkten und reichen Sie die Daten bei der örtlichen Behörde ein.

Sie kennen nun die Emissionen der Vorläufer und die direkt und indirekt mit den Produkten verbundenen Emissionen. Der letzte Schritt besteht darin, die Emissionen pro Produkt zu berechnen und das Ergebnis bei den örtlichen Behörden einzureichen. Vergessen Sie nicht, zusätzliche Dokumente wie Messnachweise, Berechnungsnachweise und Nachweise über die Zahlung des CO2-Preises im Herkunftsland einzureichen.

##### CBAM-Compliance-Plattform

Die Plattform von Dubrink vereinfacht die CBAM-Einhaltung durch die Erfassung, Berechnung, Validierung und Organisation von CBAM-Emissionsdaten zwischen Importeuren, Lieferanten und Vertretern.

[Kostenlos testen](https://www.dubrink.com/cbam-software-pricing/)

#### Risikominderung

#### Plattform-Unterstützung

## Reduzieren Sie Ihr Risiko!

Importeure sind unter CBAM erheblichen Risiken ausgesetzt. Die Dokumentation und Validierung von Lieferantendaten, einschließlich Eingaben, Berechnungen und unterstützenden Dokumenten, ist entscheidend. Prüfungen können Jahre später stattfinden, wodurch der Nachweis von Berechnungen und die Aufbewahrung unerlässlich sind. Das Sammeln von Informationen von allen Lieferanten und Unterlieferanten ist zeitaufwendig. Die Intelligent CBAM Compliance Platform von Dubrink rationalisiert diesen Prozess.

![CBAM proof suppliers STORAGE](https://www.dubrink.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/CBAM-proof-suppliers-STORAGE.png)



#### Flexibilität und Skalierbarkeit

Eine flexible Plattform, die sich anpasst und skalierbar ist, um mit dem Unternehmen zu wachsen.



#### Bezahlung nach Nutzung

Kosteneffizientes Zahlungsmodell, das Flexibilität und Erschwinglichkeit bietet.

"Innovatives Tool gegen CBAM-Risiken."

Importeure können Lieferanten und deren Unterlieferanten einladen, Emissionen, Nachweise und Berechnungen über unsere Plattform einzureichen.

**"EXPERTENBERATUNG AUF ABRUF, JEDERZEIT"**

## Understanding CBAM
# What is CBAM?

The Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) represents a groundbreaking climate policy introduced by the European Union to combat carbon leakage and promote global climate action. This comprehensive guide explains everything businesses need to know about CBAM compliance, reporting requirements, and implementation timelines.

## Understanding CBAM

CBAM serves as the EU's innovative response to the challenge of carbon leakage – where companies move production to countries with less stringent climate policies. By requiring importers to purchase carbon certificates corresponding to the carbon price that would have been paid had the goods been produced under the EU's carbon pricing rules, CBAM ensures a level playing field while supporting global climate goals.

The mechanism extends the EU's existing carbon pricing policies to imports, ensuring that the ambitious climate action being taken by EU industries is not undermined by less climate-conscious production in non-EU countries.

* * *

## Who is impacted by CBAM?

### EU Importers

- Companies importing CBAM goods into the EU market
- Responsible for reporting emissions data and purchasing CBAM certificates
- Must establish systems for tracking and verifying embedded emissions

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-importers)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/ship.BNMGszuW_2rjQt4.webp)

### Suppliers & Distributors

- Companies exporting CBAM-covered goods to the EU
- Required to provide detailed emissions data for their products
- Must implement emissions monitoring and reporting systems

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-suppliers-and-distributors)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/steel.Cq8v53BQ_ZNwwm5.webp)

### Customs Representatives and Verification Bodies

- Support importers with CBAM compliance
- Verify emissions calculations and documentation
- Submit verified reports to EU authorities

[Explore Solutions](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-compliance-for-customs-representatives)

![](https://www.dubrink.com/_astro/customs.B39uiHCV_ZHItxq.webp)

* * *

## CBAM Timeline & Requirements

### Transitional Period (2023-2025)

During this phase, businesses must:

- Report quarterly on embedded emissions in imported goods
- Collect and verify detailed emissions data
- Establish systems for ongoing compliance

### Full Implementation (2026 onwards)

Starting in 2026, importers will need to:

- Submit verified emissions declarations
- Demonstrate compliance with all reporting requirements

From the first of February 2027, companies will have to buy the certificates for the year 2026. The certificate price will be based on the average cost of 2026.
It is essential that importers take this uncertainty into account.

* * *

## Frequently asked questions

### Which products are covered by CBAM?

CBAM initially covers imports of cement, iron and steel, aluminium, fertilizers, electricity, and hydrogen. The scope may expand to include additional sectors in the future. You can identify goods subject to CBAM in [our CBAM code identifier](https://www.dubrink.com/en/cbam-cn-code-identifier).

### How do I calculate embedded emissions?

Emissions calculations must follow EU-approved methodologies, considering both direct and indirect emissions from production processes. Dubrink's platform automates these calculations according to EU standards.

### What are the penalties for non-compliance?

The European Union has established penalties for non-compliance with CBAM regulations, including fines, import restrictions, and other measures to address non-compliance.

### When do I need to purchase CBAM certificates?

Under the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM), importers must purchase CBAM certificates to cover the embedded emissions of their imported goods. Starting from February 1, 2027, importers will be required to purchase CBAM certificates for emissions generated in the year 2026.

### Cookie Settings
